snippet: Some in Sierra Leone ran away from their homes Saturday and others clashed with health workers trying to bury dead Ebola victims as the country struggled through the second day of an unprecedented lockdown to combat the deadly disease....

headline.print_headline: Sierra Leone Staggers in Ebola Isolation Effort
headline.main: Sierra Leone Staggers in Ebola Isolation Effort

lead_paragraph: Some in Sierra Leone ran away from their homes Saturday and others clashed with health workers trying to bury dead Ebola victims as the country struggled through the second day of an unprecedented lockdown to combat the deadly disease.
